note: This one isn't done, but I've done all I can for tonight (2-5-23), improve this pod and the quiz next year please.

questions.text: In which of the following situations would a sound wave appear to have a HIGHER frequency than it was created at. Chose the best possible answer

answerChoices.text: A noisy car is moving fast toward an observer.
A noisy car is moving fast away from an observer.
An observer is moving quickly towards a stationary source of a sound.
An observer is moving quickly away from a stationary source of a sound.
A source of sound is close to an observer.
A source of sound is far away from an observer.
A and C
B and D
A, C, and E
B, D, and F

questions.text: In which of the following situations would a sound wave appear to have a LOWER frequency than it was created at. Chose the best possible answer

answerChoices.text: A noisy car is moving fast toward an observer.
A noisy car is moving fast away from an observer.
An observer is moving quickly towards a stationary source of a sound.
An observer is moving quickly away from a stationary source of a sound.
A source of sound is close to an observer.
A source of sound is far away from an observer.
A and C
B and D
A, C, and E
B, D, and F
